description: The Butterfly Bush (Buddleja davidii 'Nanho Blue') is a stunning plant species with much to offer. During mid-summer, it produces fragrant clusters of deep-blue flowers which attract an array of vibrant butterflies. The vigorous and fast-growing shrub is also popular for it's tolerance of poor soil, low maintenance, and long blooming period. During the fall, it produces silvery-green foliage, giving it beautiful year-round appeal. Growing up to 6 feet high and wide, this butterfly bush is the ideal perennial to add interest to the garden.
